The Gunfight at the O.K. Corral was a 30-second shootout between lawmen and 
members of a loosely organized group of outlaws called the Cowboys that took 
place at about 3:00 p.m. on Wednesday, October 26, 1881, in Tombstone, 
Arizona Territory. It is generally regarded as the most famous shootout in the 
history of the ... The shootout has come to represent a period of the American Old 
West when...
